Name: Halloween Rairyuu
Master Ability Effect:
HP 10% for ally
15 earth atk for ally
20 slash resist pen for self
Short Character Overview(WIP):
Rairyuu got high damage and is deadly against Tanks with his spirit and slash pen.
He got decent tankyness thanks to Paladin sub and immortal spirit lets him survive lethal once.
Black mage sub offers the devastating Flare, but hes usally build for slash atk and blackmage offers no TP skills which makes paladin the preferable sub in most cases. His TMR gives a selfrevive which makes it one of the best TMR for now. He is weak to slash and Wind.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin (BM in rare cases)
Passiv 1: Earth-Enhancing Rune
Passiv 2: Mag UP 
Reactive: Magic Commutation (without Bell) / Paladins Guard (with bell)

Name: Knight of Ruin Sterne
Short Character Overview(WIP):
RSterne is one of the best evasion units alongside Vinera. 
He got extremly high damage and a instacast diamond aoe.
He even got good enough base tankyness and 20% base slash resist, making him able to be played in a bruiser comb. His biggest downside is extrem weaknes to magic and the fairly common skill 'holy'.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Samurai
Passiv 1: Desperation
Passiv 2: Blade Soul
Reactive: Dark Shadow (evasion Build) / Murderous Glare (none evasion)

Name: Halloween Little Leela
Master Ability Effect:
10%Wind HP for ally
15 Wind atk for ally
10 evasion for self
Short Character Overview(WIP):
Little Leela is basically a more supportive Wind version of Ildyra.
Her Main job offers strong offensive abilitys aswell as strong heals without cast time. 
White Mage sub gives her Full-life and Curada.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage
Passiv 1: Level 4 to Level 3
Passiv 2: Shukuchi
Reactive: Damage Distribution

Name: Glacelia
Short Character Overview(WIP):
Glacelia is a high Range, high DPS Unit and (so far) the strongest Pierce unit. 
She got extremly high agility which can potentially be a downside, because she tends to run solo into the enemy. She also got high base slash resistence, but suffers from poor magic and missle res.
Recommended Build:
Sub : Ninja, Valkyrie
Passiv 1: Jab Mastery 
Passiv 2: Shadow runner OR HP Up OR Shukuchi
Reactive: Counter Sting

Name: Agrias
Short Character Overview(WIP): Very Tanky Support because of MA. Can buff SPR up in an AoE, can stop and disable enemies. LB can Confuse. She has 20% magic resist so give her high faith for status effect is recommeded. Can also use Paladin sub for tanking/Taunting. Downside is low mobility and lack of range, useless in clearing normal stages.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Holy Knight
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Knight's Faith (Agi Up, SPR Up)
Reaction: Defense (Chance of damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Delita
Short Character Overview(WIP): Bulky Slash attacker. Can debuff Fire resistance, cause Doom and AoE Stop. Can also damage enemy AP, preventing them using powerful attacks. Have a powerful self buff of 60% ATK/MAG at a cost of 40% AP consumption increase. Lack of Defense penetration make it hard for him to deal with Physical tanks.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Squire
Support 1: Move +1
Support 2: Self- Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All Attack Res Down) 
Reaction: Paladin's Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Oldor
Master Ability Effect:
Acquired AP +30%,
Slash, Pierce, Strike, Missile ATK Resistance +5
Short Character Overview(WIP): Slash Attacker with high ATK power and AP. Can use "Hazard Break" constantly with deadly power because of MA and +20% AP from ability board. Very powerful TMR with AP auto recovery and Defense penetration. Has many power skills such as Drain Force, Large Throw or Blazing Blade. Only drawbacks are low movement of 3/1 and lack of ranged skills so clearing stages take longer.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Viking
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/ Atk Up)
Support 2: Self- Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All Attack Res Down) 
Reaction: Counter Slash (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Kilufe
Short Character Overview(WIP): Kilfe is a very versatile Character, she can Tank increasing her Hate via Spellblade Sub,Heal via White Mage sub which also grands a light magic attack, or apply Confusion and Stun via Battle Mage sub, additionally she can deal decent amounts of aoe damage and increase the faith of your party.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage
Support 1: Magic Up Lv.1
Support 2: Defense Up Lv. 1
Reaction: Anti-barrier (Chance of damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Warrior of Light
Short Character Overview(WIP): Warrior of Light is a great Tank with resistances against every damage type except Pierce. He got a teleporting damage skill giving him the opportunity to quickly engage as frontline and maintain his role as enemys focus with his Skill, which increases hate. Which also makes him able to run a different Vision Card other than 'Vow of Love' due to his high amounts of Hate.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Light Warrior
Support 1: Beginning Warrior (Max HP up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Providence of Dark: Magic ATK Res Up, Dark Res Up)
Reaction: Warrior's Pride: 3 turn DEF up when hit by Physical Atk

Name: Rain
Short Character Overview(WIP): Rain is a mainly a Magic tank, hes able to basically negate any kind of magic damage. He can be build to somewhat withstand physical damage aswell but is greatly outshine by WoL and Engel. He also can be build as magic dps and greatly fullfill that role. .
Recommended Build:
Sub: Red Mage/ Grandshelt Knight
Support 1: Spirit Up Lv.1/ HP UP Lv.1
Support 2: Intersifying Power (Magic Up, Enhance skills)
Reaction: Sword Guard: Chance to reduce damage when taking damage

Name: Vinera
Short Character Overview(WIP): Vinera got High mobility.Various debuff skills to reduce defense, very useful for Physical team in Raid and Boss stages. Have defense penetration passive. Really high evasion. Cancer for Arena and PvP
Recommended Build:
Sub: Double Gunner
Support 1: Thief Lore ( Move+1, Agi Up)
Support 2: Tune-up (Agi Up, Def Penetration Up)
Reaction: Dark Shadow (Chance of raising own Evasion Rate for 3 turns when Taking damage (Stackable up to 3 times) & CT Up)

Name: Viktora
Short Character Overview(WIP): Viktora excels in fast casting long range Jump attacks, with the help of her Master ability. She got good mobility with her Main Job being Dragoon giving her 4 Jump and access to move 1+ from her Thief Sub. She can use Soldier sub for Hazard form to increase her damage, but she is very fragile.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Dragoon
Support 1: Self- Sacrifice (Great ATK Up, All Res Down)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move+1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Dragon's Blade (Chance of Counterattack when taking Damage & absorbs Damage dealt)

Name: Lucia
Short Character Overview(WIP): Lucia is a great DPS, her high agility and long range make her really scary. Ranger sub gives her even more range and the ability to use high terrain to her advantage.Her defense ignore passiv greatly increases her damage against tanks, and with her MA especially Earth tanks like Mont.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Double Gunner/Ranger
Support 1: Ranger Lore (Range +1 & ACC UP)
Support 2: Tune-up (Agi Up, Defense Penetration Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Miranda
Short Character Overview(WIP): Miranda can reach high Mag numbers with her Ability Board and Master ability, thanks to the Red Mage sub she gets high initial AP from the Board, allowing her to cast her powerful LB right at the start of Combat. She got good support abilitys with Time Mage sub and gets reasonably tanky for a main dps.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: Speed Cast (reduce Casttime)
Support 2: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Reaction: Paladins Guard (Chance to reduce physical damage)

Name: Kitone
Short Character Overview(WIP): Kitone is a highly mobile dps unit, she got high base move and jump and can even further increase her mobility with her skills. She can also buff up her patk similar to Sterne which allows high damage spikes. Her biggest issues are her low range and survivability.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ninja
Support 1: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)/Shadow Runner (Agi & Luck up)
Support 2: Self- Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All Attack Res Down)
Reaction: Slow Counter (Chance of inflicting Slow on target for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: "Whisper"
Master Ability Effect:
Slash ATK +5,
All Attack Type Resistance +5
Short Character Overview(WIP): Whisper got 30% res to all attack types and can be build to 100% resist one or maybe even two of them, she very versatile in her tanking behavior but hard to pull of since, if shes build for Slash res and you hit a missle team her low base tankyness is a big issue. She excels against mono damage type teams and is worse than most other tanks against mixed damage. She can also be played as Evasion Tank thank to Samurais high evasion.
Recommended Build:
Tank                                                       Evade
Sub: Spellblade                                     Sub: Samurai
Passiv 1: HP Up Lv.1                             Passiv 1: Blade soul
Passiv 2: Providence of Light                Passiv 2: HP UP Lv 1
Reactve: Sword Guard                          Reactive: Third Eye

Name: Orlandu
Short Character Overview(WIP): Orlandu is the good at 'almost' everything Unit. He is a great DPS, can be build for evasion combs and can even be build tanky enough to exel in bruiser combs. He can reduce defence and lightning res to even further increase hs damage. His only downside is his low chaining potential.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Samurai/Sword Saint
Support 1: Thunder God (Great ATK Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Blade Soul (ATk/Evasion Up, DEF down)
Reaction: Auto-Refresh (Chance of recovering AP when taking Damage)

Name: Ramza
Short Character Overview(WIP): Ramza is extremly versatile. Hes fairly tanky got acces to magic and physical damage if he uses spellblade as sub, which is recommended. He can deal decent amounts of damage, he can be played as Tank thanks to access to taunting spell and also got some buffs, debuffs and a heal. He is a good addition to almost every team.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Spellblade
Support 1: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Support 2: Shadow Runner (Agi/Luck Up)
Reaction: Counter Tackle/ Magic Guard

Name: Christmas Ramada
Short Character Overview(WIP): Christmas Ramada simular to Sterne, got Soldier as Main job allowing her to get high amounts of atk and Ninja as Sub for some ranged power, also she got a 3-hit water attack allowing her to stack and maintain high water Chains.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ninja
Support 1: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Support 2: Self- Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All Attack Res Down)
Reaction: Counter Slash (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Yerma
Short Character Overview(WIP): Yerma is a very valuable Unit. She can reach extremly high damage numbers and thanks to Viking she got acces to one of the hardest hitting skills in the game 'full-bodied blow' Her Limit is extremly strong reducing the enemys elemental resistence and reduceing her own damage taken for 3 turns. With this Limit she is a really scary bruiser and higly underrated. Additionally her Limit reduceing elemental res and thiefs 'steal time' make her valueable for any raid team.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Viking
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/ Atk Up)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Sword Guard (Chance of Damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Frederika
Short Character Overview(WIP): Frederika excels in High Range and good mobility, both in addition to each other results that she she can stay out of the enemys range, while killing them with her high range. She got a good amount of debuffs and can use the Ranger sub to make use of the heights advantage on certain map. With her Sniping skill she can counter high evasion units.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Gunner/ Ranger
Support 1: Shukuchi/ Shadow Runner
Support 2: Concentration/ Ranger Lore
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Sterne Leonis
Short Character Overview(WIP): Sterne is a very strong attacker, with good mobility. His Ninja sub job, allows him to get move/jump +1 and gives him a ranged skill to kill units from afar. He can reach really high damage numbers, but suffers from low survivability.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ninja 
Support 1: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1) 
Support 2: Self- Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All Attack Res Down) 
Reaction: Counter Slash (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Gilgamesh
Master Ability Effect:
Speed +10%, Slash ATK +10
Level 80: HP +1000, Accuracy +15
Short Character Overview(WIP): Gilgamesh is very versatile, hes tanky, can deal good amounts of damage and additionally got support potential. His unique main Job gives him an aoe attack that reduces Slash resistance and he can use Time mage sub for haste and quicken  and strong Magic attacks. His biggest downside is being SUPER expensive to build, he cost about twice as much as other UR units.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: AP gain Up Lv. 1
Support 2: Speed Cast (Cast Time Down)
Reaction: Clairvoyant Blade (Chance of pre-emptive attack when about to take physical Damage)

Name: Ayaka
Short Character Overview(WIP): Ayaka is the best Support unit in the Game. Her heals are extremly strong, and her high amount of starting AP gives her access to her Limit Turn one. Time mage sub gives her haste and the strong skills 'comet' and 'meteor'  makeing her playable as magic dps. which is supported by her high amount of MAG. Being White mage also gives her access to 2 of the strongest skills 'Holy' and Full life'.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: Speed Cast (Cast Time Down)
Support 2: Emerald Echo (Buff/ Debuff cast by self +1 turn)
Reaction: Dispel Counter (Removes all Buffs from enemy when taking Damage)

Name: Mediena
Short Character Overview(WIP): Mediena is ultimate farmer. Very high AGI and starting AP and her Diamond aoe limitbreak let her clear waves of enemys within a blink of an eye. Blackmages Flare and blizzaga make her a great DPS for Raid content. Her really low tankyness and suicidal AI make her a bad choice for any auto PvP content.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage/ Green Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: Shukuchi / Shadow runner
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Macherie Hourne
Short Character Overview(WIP): Machérie is the best example of a bad Unit. Cleric is a really underwhelming class which offers only Banish and cure as decent skills. Monk gives her nothing usefull at all. Blackmage sub at least gives her Banishra and Banishga to support her fairly high mag stat, but she doesnt get access to Blackmages best skill 'Flare'. Her Limit is completly useless. Shes only worth raising for some Niche use in Tower and to get her really strong TMR.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Oelde Leonis
Short Character Overview(WIP): Oelde is a decent DPS. He got high crit chance and good Patk, allows him to murder everything in his range, which is also his main flaw, his really low range, in addition to bad movement. He also got low survivability. He eighter needs to run in an Evasion comb, highly relying on luck or cast his Limit for damage reduction. He is very hard to be played effectiv.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer/ Samurai
Support 1: Blade Soul (ATK/Evasion Rate Up & DEF down)
Support 2: Deadly Mastery/ Pierce Mastery
Reaction: Counter Thrust / Third Eye

Name: Aileen
Short Character Overview(WIP): Aileen, is scary, for you and the enemy. She got extremly high damage and can murder almost everything, but suffers from no tankyness at all. She got low range and mobility and unlike oelde not even the ability to play in a evasion comb. She is a high risk high reward character, if you're able to make her survive she'll kill everything.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice (Great ATK Up & All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Deadly Mastery/ Pierce mastery 
Reaction: Counter Thrust (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Robb Hourne
Short Character Overview(WIP): Robb is a fast Damage dealer, who excels in high Crit and Evasion, he got good AP management, which is nice for long fights and is overall a really 'easy to use' dps. He got low movement and tankyess, which makes him less appealing than other dps units
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer/ Samurai
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice (Great ATK Up & All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Deadly Mastery (Crit Rate Up)/ Blade Soul (ATK/Evasion Rate Up & DEF down)
Reaction: Third Eye

Name: Engelbert
Short Character Overview(WIP): Engelbert is one of the best Tanks, hes potentially able to negate any physical damage, and with paladings taunting blade is able to increase his hate. With his high amount of selfbuffs and low movement it is hard for him to be the frontline and take enemys aggro. He is hard countered by Magic damage and deals almost no damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: HP up Lv.1
Reaction: Sword Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Xiza
Short Character Overview(WIP): Xizas main use is in  manual PvP with her high agility and Thiefs 'steal heart'. Monks 'Pummel' and Thiefs 'Steal time' make her very strong for chain building. Her TMR is one of the best in the game. giving 25% AP regen per turn, for 3 turns in addition to the very valueable 7 agi it provides.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Monk
Support 1: Strike Mastery / HP UP Lv1
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Fist Counter / Quick Action

Name: Thancred
Short Character Overview(WIP): Thancred is a Bruiser, being able to tank while dealing good amounts of damage, he has some potential do deal ranged damage as well as supporting, especially Tanks, increasing def and granting health regen to other allies
Recommended Build:
Sub: Gunbreaker
Support 1: HP UP Lv1
Support 2: whatever you need
Reaction: Jagular Rip (Chance of Counterattack when taking damage)

Name: Mustadio
Master Ability Effect:
Accuracy +30
Increase the chance of Blind/ Doom/ Disable statuses
Short Character Overview(WIP): Very good range attacker. His MA and TMR is very good against evasion characters. He can also cause many statuses and thanks to his MA, they have higher chance of landing. All sub jobs are useful, Thief sub can cause many statuses but requires him to move in close, which is not really recommended.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Machinist/ Ranger
Support 1: Aim (Jump/Range +1)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Lavie
Short Character Overview(WIP): Has an excellent Master Ability. Can be built as an evasion tank with Thief Lore, Blade Soul and Third Eye Combo. When used as tank, Attract Blade is cheaper to use because of MA. When used as a Tanky debuffer (with Thief Sub), she can Steal Heart/ Steal Time. Beware that she would need high Faith for debuffs to land, thus increasing Magic Damage taken.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin/Thief
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Paladin's Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Shimur
Short Character Overview(WIP): Shimur is a damage type character. With access to Thief he gets good mobility and can reduce the enemys CT, which makes him viable for Raid and Boss battles.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Thief
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/ Atk Up)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Quick Action (Chance of significantly raising own Agility for 1 turn after taking damage)

Name: Dario
Short Character Overview(WIP): Dario is the best MR Tank, his MA alongside Paladins passiv gives him a lot of free resistance. Ninjas Shukuchi gives him the much needed mobility to run ahead as frontline and take enemys aggro. His TMR helps a lot with tauning blade/spells high AP cost so he can regain his hate frequently.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin/ Spellblade
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Reaction: Paladin's Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Tyrell
Short Character Overview(WIP): Tyrell is a fairly strong free Unit, His MA and passivs give him a lot of HP and allow him to take some hits, while Viking subs high modifier give him some decent damage output. Knight main gives access to the strong trinity break. He suffers from really high AP cost and low mobility
Recommended Build:
Sub: Viking
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/ Atk Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Sword Guard (Chance of Damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Salire
Short Character Overview(WIP): Salire is basically the MR version of Mediena, her MA allows her to reach high Mag. She can cast Thunder and none element magic with Blackmage and thanks to White Mage she gets the really powerful light magic attack Holy. The Ninja passive gives her good mobility. Overall one of the best MR Units.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage/ White Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: Shukuchi/ Shadow Runner
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Adelard
Short Character Overview(WIP): Adelard got high Mag thanks to his MA. He can be a magic damage dealer while also perfoming well as support with heals and several buffs, also he got high initial AP buffing him for extented battles.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Red Mage/ White Mage
Support 1: Initial AP Up Lv.1 
Support 2: Mage's Protection (Increase Magic ATK Res)
Reaction: Dispel Counter

Name: Dorando
Short Character Overview(WIP): Viking gives him some nice damaging Skill and his MA and Passiv gives him some reasonable HP and with Gunner sub he also gets some nice buffs for his Team. He is really slow, with low mobility.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Gunner
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/Atk Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1 
Reaction: Counter Shot (Chance of countertattack when taking damage)

Name: Gaffgarion
Short Character Overview(WIP): Gaffgarion is so an amazing Free unit. With his MA and passivs he can deal a lot of damage. While his damage is outstanding a lot of his strong skill consume HP making it hard for him to survive if his fairly high evasion isnt enough. He also suffers from low mobility.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Fell Knight / Warrior
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Atk Up Lv.1
Reaction: Old Mercenary (Chance of counterattack when taking damage and absorbing the damage done)

Name: Etre
Short Character Overview(WIP): Etre suffer hard from her extremly underwhelming jobs, as Monk main she got almost no attacking moves. Cleric offers nothing to support her and Knight sub adds a different damage type. she got some Chain potential and decent mobility, her TMR is also decent for the 3 agi it offers. other than that she got low tankyness and no damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Monk
Support 1: Strike Mastery (Strike Atk Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Fist Counter (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical damage)

Name: Nasha
Short Character Overview(WIP): Nasha is a fairly decent Tank. she got high amounts of HP and a good combination of Passiv and Reactive. She can potentially run White mage sub for some healing, but looses the ability to generate hate. He low agi and mobility make it hard for her to access the frontline.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin/White Mage
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: HP up Lv.1
Reaction: Paladin's Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Shadowlynx
Short Character Overview(WIP): Shadowlynx is one of the most mobile Units in this game. She can reach 6 move and 6 Jump roaming around the map without effort. She got decently high atk, can stop the enemy and increas the Evade of herself and allies. Shes very squishy and only her high Evade gives her some fake tankyness. Shes also good for Chains.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Samurai/ Ninja
Support 1: Shadow Runner (Agi/Luck Up)
Support 2: Blade Soul (Atk/Evasion UP, DEF Down)
Reaction: Third Eye (Chance of raising own Evasion Rate for 3 turns when taking Damage (stackable up to 3 times))

Name: Mont Leonis
Short Character Overview(WIP): Mont is the go to Tank for everyone, he can reach high HP stats and even deal some decent damage. Hes really easy and cheap to max out, cuz his shards are available for Gil is the Shop. His Knight Sub gives him access to some debuffs, but his Paladin sub is usally recommended to generate Hate and maintain enemys focus.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Crown Prince of Leonis (Atk Up)
Reaction: Sword Guard

Name: YShtola
Short Character Overview(WIP): Y'shtola is a fairly usable Free Unit, shes easy to max out and can be a decent farmer thanks to her diamond aoe. She can deal some good damage but suffers from REALLY bad Tankyness and movement. She can use White mage sub for some healing and Holy or Greenmage for some mediocre buffs and the fairly stong no element ruin. Future buffs make her fairly strong.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Sorceress/ White Mage
Support 1: Enochian (Mag Up)
Support 2: Savior's Protection (Debuff Res/ Magic ATK Res Up)
Reaction: Manafont (Chance of recovering own AP when taking Damage)

Name: Owe
Short Character Overview(WIP): Owe is a mediocre Physical Attacker. He can increase you partys Bravery and Evasion, and got some ranged damage with Hien. Ninja Sub further increases his ranged damage potential and increases his mobility. He naturally really squishy.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ninja
Support 1: Blade Soul (Atk/Evasion Up, DEF down)
Support 2: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Reaction: Third Eye (Chance of raising own Evasion Rate for 3 turns when taking Damage (Stackable up to 3 times)

Name: Marguerite
Short Character Overview(WIP): Margritte got access to 3 super strong jobs. As Time mage she got access to quicken and haste some very valuable support skill. Comet and meteor give her some good attacking spells. She can also run Blackmage sub for Firaga a really strong on element attack or Red mage for Fira and Cura and fast cast. Her only downside are her low mobility and tankyness.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage/ Red Mage
Support 1: Magic Up Lv.1
Support 2: Swift Cast
Reaction: Magic Counter / Magic Reflex

Name: Grace
Short Character Overview(WIP): Grace is the best MR healer so far and thats also all she does, healing her allies, she got some minor buffs with Shell and Protest which usally arent advised to level for Auto play purpose.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage
Support 1: Emerald Echo (Increase effect duration of Buff/Debuff cast by self by 1 turn)
Support 2: Savior's Protection (Debuff Res/ Magic ATK Res Up)
Reaction: Regenerator (Chance of bestowing Regen on self for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: Cadia
Short Character Overview(WIP): Cadia is what Macherie wishes she would be. She can cleanse debuffs and be a fairly decent healer. A nice overall support. She also got decent resistance against magic damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage
Support 1: Spirit Up Lv.1 
Support 2: Providence of Earth (Earth Res/ Magic ATK Res Up)
Reaction: Regenerator (Chance of bestowing Regen on self for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: Ramada
Short Character Overview(WIP): Ramada can work well in the beginning of the game thanks to early access to 'Nighthawk'. She can get a fair amount of Pierce attack and thanks to Thief Lore she got nice mobility. For harder content she lacks damage and Tankyness, but can be used for mug and steal time.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer
Support 1: Pierce Mastery ( Pierce ATK Up)
Support 2: Thief Lore ( Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Counter Thrust (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage & Piercing)

Name: Vistralle
Short Character Overview(WIP): Vistralle is the best Main Thief (until a UR Thief gets released), He can Mug, Steal Heart, Steal time and all that usefull Thief stuff. His sub jobs offer nearly nothing usefull other than maybe some passivs. Because Thier requires high faith hes vurnable to all kinds of damage and relies on Evasion to survive. Hes nothing amazing, but if you need everything a Thief can offer, he is you best bet.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Thief
Support 1: Self Sacrifice ( Great Atk Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Magic reflex

Name: Khury Wezette
Short Character Overview(WIP): Khury makes use of his range to as Ranger and use high ground to his advantage. His Ma gives him a stong AP economy and Dragoon sub allows some jump attacks. he got low HP and low damage and mixed pierce and missle damage doesnt help him a lot.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Dragoon
Support 1: Focus (Cast time Down, Missile Atk Up)
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Schuzelt
Short Character Overview(WIP): Schuzelt is the MR Unit with the Highest ATK. His Hazard Form skill gives him a great boost in damage and acces to Ranger sub gives him the potential to kill the enemys out of save distance. Hes fairly usable, but got low mobility and no tankyness.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice ( Great Atk Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Fina
Short Character Overview(WIP): Fina is the only Unit yet released in Global that can increase faith and only for this shes fairly usable. She can support your allies with heals and buffs and deal some minor damage with Gunner Sub. Really only usefull to perma raise your faith
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage of Lapis
Support 1: Innocent Shooter (Range +1, Magic Up)
Support 2: Secret of Shooting (Missle Atk Up)
Reaction: Counter Shot (Chance of counterattack when taking damage)

Name: Helena Leonis
Short Character Overview(WIP): Helenas biggest problem is Green mage as Main job, this Job offers nearly nothing usefull other than Ruin and emerald Echo. Her sub Job on the other hand are really strong and help her to get the role of one of the better MR Unit. Time mage sub helps her teammates to cycle thru a lot of turns and White mage sub makes her a great healer.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: Emerald Echo (Increase effect duration of Buff/Debuff cast by self by 1 turn)
Support 2: Speed Cast (Cast Time Down)
Reaction: Slow Counter (Chance of inflicting Slow on target for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: Meriluke
Short Character Overview(WIP): Meriluke got an amazing MA, but her Job combination doesnt support this at all, monk as main job offers almost no attacking moves, greenmage is useless for her and knight got some decent debuffs but doesnt offer a lot of damage potential. pummel makes her usable for chains, but shes just not worth any investment.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Monk
Support 1: Strike Mastery (Strike Atk Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Fist Counter (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical damage)

Name: Rairyuu
Short Character Overview(WIP): Rairyuu is good Unit for new Player. His high range makes him really easy to use. also Thief lore gives him nice mobility to stay out of enemys range, since he got no tankyness at all.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Gunner
Support 1: Thief Lore (Move +1, 12% AGI)
Support 2: Concentration (Range +2, Evasion Down)
Reaction: Quick Action (Chance of significantly raising own Agility for 1 turn after taking damage)

Name: Lilyth
Short Character Overview(WIP): Lilyth is fairly simular to Schuzelt with less atk, she makes use of her Ranger sub for some long range attacks and got some debuffs with her Knight main. She's usable, nothing super amazing.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice ( Great Atk Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Lorenzo
Short Character Overview(WIP): Lorenzo is a bruiser type, he gets fairly tanky, he can use Jump attack with his Dragoon job, or get some medium range attacks with Lancer as sub. He could also use Time mage as Sub to support his allies with Haste and quicken, but this requires to raise his faith. Remember speed cast also reduces his Jumps cast time.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer/Time mage 
Support 1: Pierce Mastery / HP UP LV1
Support 2: HP UP Lv1/ Speed Cast 
Reaction: Dragon's Blade (Chance of Counterattack when taking Damage & absorbs Damage dealt)

Name: Phoebe
Short Character Overview(WIP): Best SR Unit in game, even better then some MR Unit. Very good mobility and speed for a support. Has Haste and Quick and Healing spell. Good at manipulating turn of Allies and Enemy. Extremely good TMR for a SR. Highly recommended for raising.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: Speed Cast (Cast Time Down)
Support 2: Jump +1 / HP Up LV.1
Reaction: Slow Counter (Chance of inflicting Slow on target for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: Little Leela
Short Character Overview(WIP): Somewhat tanky mostly against magic damage, with some healing potenial. Mostly just a budget Freyvia.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Spellblade
Support 1: Providence of Light (Magic ATK Res/ Light Res Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Sworld Guard (Chance of Damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Murmur
Short Character Overview(WIP): Shes a decent Magic dps,and can reach 100 Magic res (mostly for the memes) she is fairly usable for a SR. Low overall base stats.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage
Support 1: Mag Up Lv.1
Support 2:Initial AP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Baelo
Short Character Overview(WIP): Poor Man's Engelbert. He is a worse tank than Mont is everyway with the same element. So not sure if there is any reason to raise him. Don't think there is a content that requires 2 Earth tanks, but only then he might be useful (still questionable). He has some decent breaks from his Knight job, especial "Trinity break" and that's it.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: HP up Lv.1
Reaction: Sword Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Socia
Short Character Overview(WIP): With Jump 4, she can reach high ground and use her Ranger skills to Attack enemy from afar. Her jump attacks also deal decent damage. She's usable, but overall below average stats maker her hard to use.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Atk Up Lv.1
Support 2: HP UP Lv1 / Ranger Lore 
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Vallaide
Short Character Overview(WIP): Simular to Helena he suffer from a poor Main Job, but White mage and Red mage sub give him some well needed utility. White mage gives him some good healing and also full-life to revive a dead allie. Red mage gives some minor healing, minor damage and fastcast to support allied caster. He is usable, but suffer from low basestats.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage/Red Mage
Support 1: Initial AP Up Lv.1
Support 2: Emerald Echo (Increase effect duration of Buff/Debuff cast by self by 1 turn)
Reaction: Regenerator (Chance of bestowing Regen on self for 3 turns when taking damage)

Name: Surjes
Short Character Overview(WIP): Lancer is a weak main Job, Cleric is beyond useless and Paladin as Lancer only offers the Passiv and reactive. As damage dealer main class he got no damage, His MA doesnt support his kit. Hes a tragic victim of bad design.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Pierce Mastery (Pierce Atk Up)
Reaction: Counter Thrust (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage, Piercing)

Name: Vadim
Short Character Overview(WIP): Can be used as item collector with steal and Mug, also Steal Time and Steal heart are really usefull skills. His stats are really lackluster hes basically just a cheaper Vistralle or a more expensive Mia.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Samurai
Support 1: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Support 2: Acquired AP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Third Eye (Chance of raising Evasion Rate for 3 turns when taking Damage (Stackable up to 3 times))

Name: Yuni
Master Ability Effect:
HP +30%, 
Slash, Pierce, Strike, Missile ATK Resistance +10
Short Character Overview(WIP): A Tank Ranger, bad job combination, low base stats, avoid her.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Focus (Cast Time Down, Missile Atk Up) 
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Naiah
Short Character Overview(WIP): One of the most useful SR, with an amazing MA. She can serve as a good Healer/support. Red Mage sub brings some good Damage skills and Status debuff. Her ability board gives her permanent +1 move which is awesome. Worth raising if you need a pure healer. Be aware of her very low tankyness against physical damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Red Mage
Passiv 1: Just use whatever you need none are outstanding
Passiv 2: SPR UP & Mage's protection are my overall recommendations
Reactive: Regenerator for Tower otherwise Magic reflex

Name: Severo
Short Character Overview(WIP): Blackmage is always a good job and Redmage adds some extra utility. He suffers from low SR base stats, but other than that hes a fairly usable unit.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Red Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: Initial AP Up Lv.1 / HP UP Lv1
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Learte
Short Character Overview(WIP): Shes a pure Ranger, her sub jobs offer nearly nothing, she dont got enough stats to be usable a Ranger and her magic is even worse so white mage sub does nothing eighter. Just dont build her.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Focus / deadly mastery
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Miche
Short Character Overview(WIP): Miche got extremly fast cast time, amazing passivs and one of the best reactives in the game. Problem is those base stats are so beyond bad.. .
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Mia
Short Character Overview(WIP): Mia can be used as an item collector with steal and mug and also got some nice utility with Steal Heart and Steal time. Other than that her stats are garbage, so raise her at your own risk.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Thief
Support 1: Acquired AP Up Lv.1
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Quick Action (Chance of significantly raising own Agility for 1 turn after taking damage)

Name: Zazan
Short Character Overview(WIP): Zazan is mostly a meme, he got extremly high mobility and access to Steal time and Steal heart which actually makes him usable. But other than that his stats are extremly lackluster.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Thief
Support 1: HP UP Lv1 / ATK UP Lv1
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Sword Guard
